ygData.subject: spell
ygData.msgSnippet: Hey, I remember somebody posting a couple days ago about our lack of melee ability.  I agree more often than not, we have to turn tail to run to the zone.
ygData.messageBody:
Hey, I remember somebody posting a couple days ago about our lack of melee
ability. I agree more often than not, we have to turn tail to run to the
zone. I've always thought it would be cool to have that spell those
Tentacle Terrors have in Najena...you know, the ones that knock you back ten
billion feet. :) It wouldn't even need to give damage...but if it was able
to knock a whole mob of creatures away from your body for a few secs...that
would aid a whole lot in terms of survivability. Would make a good escape
combo with Shadow step.

-- Lim'Dul
